data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: Cold weather will not hurt a cow so much as rain will. Cattle ____ a ____ they ____ enter ____ weather ____ too ____ for ____. Such a shelter ( like a barn ____ a ____ shed ) would ____ enough ____. If they are able to be on pasture anytime they want then when they needed the protection of a barn they would go into it.
data.partBlankContent: Cold weather will not hurt a cow so much as rain will. Cattle ne__ a she____ they m__ enter when____ weather bec____ too mu__ for th__. Such a shelter ( like a barn o_ a sim___ shed ) would pro____ enough co___. If they are able to be on pasture anytime they want then when they needed the protection of a barn they would go into it.
data.answer: 寒冷的天气不会像下雨那样伤害一头牛。当天气对牛来说太闷热时，牛需要一个可以进入的庇护所。这样的避难所(像谷仓或简单的棚子)可以提供足够的遮蔽。如果它们可以随时去牧场，那么当它们需要谷仓的保护时，它们就会去那里。
